sentences.en: Administrative Districts: Slovenia is divided into 62 districts.
sentences.cn: 行政区划: 全国划分为62个区.

sentences.en: And hot off the press – we reveal the results of the Europe Cup in Slovenia.
sentences.cn: 在最热新闻栏目,我们报道了在斯洛文尼亚(Slovenia)举办的欧洲杯比赛结果.

sentences.en: But after the surgical department expert's diagnosis, the Slovenia people diagnoses for the left anklebone booklet.
sentences.cn: 但经过外科专家的诊断, 斯洛文尼亚人被确诊为左脚踝骨折.

sentences.en: Have you ever been to Slovenia?
Italy shares its northern, Alpine boundary with France, Switzerland, Austria and Slovenia.
sentences.cn: 意大利在北方阿尔卑斯山地区与法国 、 瑞士 、 奥地利以及斯洛文尼亚接壤.

sentences.en: Jermaine Defoe's last goal for England was also against Slovenia on September 5, 2009.
sentences.cn: 英格兰前锋迪福上一次在国度队进球还要追溯至2009年的9月5日, 敌手正好也是斯洛文尼亚!

sentences.en: Slovakia and Slovenia are safely inside the euro zone.
sentences.cn: 斯洛伐克和斯洛文尼亚在欧元区内部非常安全.

sentences.en: Slovenia scraped in at the start of this year; Malta and Cyprus may follow soon.
sentences.cn: 年初,斯洛文尼亚踉踉跄跄的加入了欧盟, 马耳他和塞浦路斯或许也不久将至.

sentences.en: Slovenia will have to pay a high price for independence.
sentences.cn: 斯洛文尼亚将为独立付出巨大的代价。

sentences.en: Strong contender Spain along with Slovenia, Paraguay and make up group B.
sentences.cn: B组除了实力不错的西班牙队外,还有斯洛文尼亚队 、 巴拉圭队和南非队.

sentences.en: The picture shows the import and export statistics between China and Slovenia.
sentences.cn: 图为中国-斯洛文尼亚进出口额统计表.
